system.description:
1/per location (or at the GM's discretion). You happen to know JUST the person who has the information you're looking for, or could get you out of a jam, and… Roll [[/r 1d20]]:

  • 1–5. They want you DEAD.

  • 6–12. You owe them money.

  • 13–19. They can be convinced to help you..

  • 20. They are your biggest fan/are madly in love with you.
